title: Customized E-Learning Design and Application: Social Sector Professional Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Step-by-step adaptation support for digitally inexperienced learners, with a focus on social field practical application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental structure of e-learning systems and principles of personalized design.
Through case analysis in social studies, learners can apply e-learning content development processes.
Using LMS-based formative assessment tools, learners can achieve over 80% of learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
